H0.text: what currency is used in panama. US Dollar

H1.text: what currency is used in panama. Colombian Peso

H2.text: what currency is used in panama. Euro

H3.text: what currency is used in panama. Panamanian balboa

A4.text: The balboa is, along with the United States dollar, one of the official currencies of Panama.

A5.text: The balboa replaced the Colombian peso in 1904 following the country's independence.
